title: Linux free Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the Linux free command, learn its syntax, and analyze memory usage with practical examples. Customize the free command output to suit your system monitoring needs.

meta.title: Linux free Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the Linux free command, learn its syntax, and analyze memory usage with practical examples. Customize the free command output to suit your system monitoring needs.
meta.keywords: Linux, free command, memory usage, system monitoring, memory analysis, command line, system management

steps.title: Understand the Purpose and Syntax of the free Command

verify.name: Verify the free command output
verify.hint: Ensure that the output of the `free` command includes the "Mem:" and "Swap:" sections.

steps.title: Analyze Memory Usage with the free Command

verify.name: Verify the free command output
verify.hint: Ensure that the output of the `free -h` command includes the "Mem:" and "Swap:" sections in a human-readable format.

verify.name: Verify the free command customization
verify.hint: Ensure that the output of the `free -h -t` command includes the "Total:" line, which displays the total memory and swap usage.
